sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165030_TEMP ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ , YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ , CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ , SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ , CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금조정일련번호 */ , CONB_CDDL /* 기부금유형구분코드 */ , ATTR_YR /* 기부년도 */ , USE_AMT /* 기부금액 */ , PYR_DDC_AMT /* 전년도공제된금액 */ , DDC_TRGT_AMT /* 기부금공제대상금액 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS /* 해당연도공제금액필요경비 */ , THC_YR_DDC_AMT /* 해당연도공제금액세액공제금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_소멸금액 */ , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT /* 해당연도미공제금액_이월금액 */ , KYBDR /* 입력자 */ , INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ , INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ , ISMT /* 수정자 */ , REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ , REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #conbSeilNum# , #conbCddl# , #attrYr# , #useAmt# , #pyrDdcAmt# , #ddcTrgtAmt# , #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , #thcYrDdcAmt# , #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE165030_TEMP SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# , CONB_CDDL=#conbCddl# , ATTR_YR=#attrYr# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , PYR_DDC_AMT=#pyrDdcAmt# , DDC_TRGT_AMT=#ddcTrgtAmt# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS=#thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT=#thcYrDdcAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT=#thcYrNducExtnAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT=#thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165030_TEMP WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030_TEMP WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030_TEMP WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CONB_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE165030_TEMP WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
